entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -11.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
